name: vim
description: Vim emulation for Visual Studio Code

commands.title: Vim: Remap any key combination that VS Code supports to Vim motions/operators/ExCommands/macro.

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && vim.active && vim.use<C-n> && !inDebugRepl || vim.mode == 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.active && vim.use<C-n> && !inDebugRepl || vim.mode == 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.active && vim.use<C-n> && !inDebugRepl

suggestWidgetVisible && vim.active && vim.use<C-p> && !inDebugRepl || vim.mode == 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.active && vim.use<C-p> && !inDebugRepl || vim.mode == 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.active && vim.use<C-p> && !inDebugRepl

vim.debug.silent.description: If true, all logs are suppressed.

vim.debug.loggingLevelForAlert.description: Maximum level of messages to present as VS Code information window.

vim.debug.loggingLevelForConsole.description: Maximum level of messages to log to console. Logs are visible in developer tools.

vim.normalModeKeyBindings.description: Remapped keys in normal mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.normalModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive.description: Non-recursive remapped keys in normal mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.useCtrlKeys.description: Enable some vim ctrl key commands that override otherwise common operations, like ctrl+c

vim.leader.description: What key should <leader> map to in remappings?

vim.highlightedyank.duration.description: Duration in milliseconds of the yank highlight.

vim.useSystemClipboard.description: Use system clipboard for unnamed register.

vim.overrideCopy.description: Override VSCode's copy command with our own copy command, which works better with VSCodeVim. Turn this off if copying is not working.

vim.insertModeKeyBindings.description: Remapped keys in insert mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.insertModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive.description: Non-recursive keybinding overrides to use for insert mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.visualModeKeyBindings.description: Remapped keys in visual mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.visualModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive.description: Non-recursive keybinding overrides to use for visual mode. Allows mapping to vim commands or vscode actions. See README for details.

vim.textwidth.description: Width to word-wrap to when using gq.

vim.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for remapped commands

vim.scroll.description: Number of lines to scroll with CTRL-U and CTRL-D commands.

vim.showcmd.description: Show the text of any command you are in the middle of writing.

vim.showmodename.description: Show the name of the current mode in the statusbar.

vim.iskeyword.description: keywords contain alphanumeric characters and '_'. If not configured `editor.wordSeparators` is used.

vim.smartcase.description: Override the 'ignorecase' option if the search pattern contains upper case characters.

vim.camelCaseMotion.enable.description: Enable the CamelCaseMotion plugin for Vim.

vim.easymotion.description: Enable the EasyMotion plugin for Vim.

vim.easymotionMarkerBackgroundColor.description: Set a custom background color for EasyMotion markers.

vim.easymotionMarkerForegroundColorOneCh.description: Set a custom color for the text on one character long markers.

vim.easymotionMarkerForegroundColorTwoCh.description: Set a custom color for the text on two character long markers.

vim.easymotionMarkerWidthPerChar.description: Set the width (in pixels) allocated to each character in the match.

vim.easymotionMarkerHeight.description: Set the height of the marker.

vim.easymotionMarkerFontFamily.description: Set the font family of the marker text.

vim.easymotionMarkerFontSize.description: Set the font size of the marker text.

vim.easymotionMarkerFontWeight.description: Set the font weight of the marker text.

vim.easymotionMarkerYOffset.description: Set the Y offset of the marker text (the distance from the top).

vim.easymotionKeys.description: Set the characters used for jump marker name

vim.replaceWithRegister.description: Enable the ReplaceWithRegister plugin for Vim.

vim.sneak.description: Enable the Sneak plugin for Vim.

vim.sneakUseIgnorecaseAndSmartcase.description: Case sensitivity is determined by 'ignorecase' and 'smartcase'

vim.surround.description: Enable the Surround plugin for Vim.

vim.hlsearch.description: Show all matches of the most recent search pattern

vim.incsearch.description: Show where a / search matches as you type it.

vim.history.description: How much search or command history should be remembered

vim.handleKeys.description: Option to delegate certain key combinations back to VSCode to be handled natively

vim.statusBarColorControl.description: Allow VSCodeVim to change status bar color based on mode. Using this feature will have a negative impact on performance.

vim.statusBarColors.normal.description: Status bar color when in Normal mode

vim.statusBarColors.insert.description: Status bar color when in Insert mode

vim.statusBarColors.visual.description: Status bar color when in Visual mode

vim.statusBarColors.visualline.description: Status bar color when in VisualLine mode

vim.statusBarColors.visualblock.description: Status bar color when in VisualBlock mode

vim.statusBarColors.replace.description: Status bar color when in Replace mode

vim.visualstar.description: In visual mode, start a search with * or # using the current selection

vim.changeWordIncludesWhitespace.description: Includes trailing whitespace when changing word

vim.foldfix.description: Uses a hack to move around folds properly

vim.mouseSelectionGoesIntoVisualMode.description: Does dragging with the mouse put you into visual mode

vim.disableExtension.description: Disables the VSCodeVim extension. Extension will continue to be loaded and activated, but VIM functionality will be disabled.

vim.enableNeovim.description: Use neovim on backend. (only works for Ex commands right now). You should restart VScode after enable/disabling this for the changes to take effect. NOTE: Neovim must be installed (v0.2.0) and neovimPath must be set the executable in order for this setting to work. Otherwise, vscodevim will crash.

vim.neovimPath.description: Path to run neovim executable. For example, /usr/bin/nvim, or  C:\Program Files\Neovim\bin\nvim.exe

vim.substituteGlobalFlag.description: Automatically apply the global flag, /g, to substitute commands. When set to true, use /g to mean only first match should be replaced.

vim.autoSwitchInputMethod.enable.description: Switch input method automatically when mode changed

vim.autoSwitchInputMethod.defaultIM.description: The input method for your normal mode, find more information here: https://github.com/VSCodeVim/Vim#input-method

vim.autoSwitchInputMethod.switchIMCmd.description: The shell command to switch input method

vim.autoSwitchInputMethod.obtainIMCmd.description: The shell command to get current input method

vim.whichwrap.description: Comma-separated list of motion keys that should wrap to next/previous line.

vim.report.description: Threshold for reporting number of lines changed.

vim.digraphs.description: Custom digraph shortcuts for inserting special characters, expressed as UTF16 code points
